title: Doing Justice Excerpt: “Beyond Justice”
description:
The sixth and final episode of Preet's new narrative podcast Doing Justice, an adaptation of his bestselling book, is out today! In this excerpt, Rais Bhuiyan describes how he began to forgive the man who shot him in a post-9/11 hate crime. 

Listen to the full episode for free here: cafe.com/doing-justice-podcast/episode-3-god-forbid 

Click here to subscribe to Doing Justice on Apple Podcasts: apple.co/doingjustice

Click here to subscribe to Doing Justice on Spotify: spoti.fi/3rhiMUM

Purchase the paperback of the bestselling book that inspired the podcast, Doing Justice: A Prosecutor's Thoughts on Crime, Punishment, and the Rule of Law: doingjusticebook.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

content:encoded:
The sixth and final episode of Preet's new narrative podcast Doing Justice, an adaptation of his bestselling book, is out today! In this excerpt, Rais Bhuiyan describes how he began to forgive the man who shot him in a post-9/11 hate crime.  Listen to the full episode for free here: cafe.com/doing-justice-podcast/episode-3-god-forbid  Click here to subscribe to Doing Justice on Apple Podcasts: apple.co/doingjustice Click here to subscribe to Doing Justice on Spotify: spoti.fi/3rhiMUM Purchase the paperback of the bestselling book that inspired the podcast, Doing Justice: A Prosecutor's Thoughts on Crime, Punishment, and the Rule of Law: doingjusticebook.com See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
